岱.definition: Mt Tai in Shandong; same as 泰山

岱宗.definition: another name for Mt Tai 泰山 in Shandong as principal or ancestor of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]; Mt Tai as resting place for departed souls

岱山.definition: Daishan county in Zhoushan 舟山[Zhou1 shan1], Zhejiang

岱山縣.definition: Daishan county in Zhoushan 舟山[Zhou1 shan1], Zhejiang

岱嶽區.definition: Daiyue district of Tai'an city 泰安市[Tai4 an1 shi4], Shandong

岱廟.definition: Dai Temple, a temple in Shandong for the god of Mount Tai
